text: Ia uarira uariv gɨa ghaze, ‘E Godɨn ziam fe, ezɨ a en akurazir puvatɨ. Ezɨ e tizim bagh an ziam fam? Egha Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itimɨn damazimɨn, e uan arazir kuraba bagha osemegha aziava dar gun a mɨkeme, ezɨ a bizir aghuitamɨn e gamizir puvatɨ. Ezɨ e manmaghsua pura uan arazir kurabar gun a mɨkeme?
